creator: lmeyer@vmware.com
text:
We would like to use a key management system that we pull keys from on demand over the network, allowing the user that the web server runs as to obtain only its keys.

We want to hook Apache into that system; we tried to use a named pipe, but ran into https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=49980

In any case, it would be a nice additional feature to allow the key to be read from a command like the SSL Passphrase Dialog function.
